plot: Its the year 2057 in Madrid. Technology provides humans with a life full of comforts and without errors... Jorge Arellano, a normal guy, will find himself trapped in his house by the same devices that guaranteed his security. How will a man used to machines solving all his problems react to this situation   Written by  Anonymous
title: Error 0036
